name: Light Keeper (NucelarWizards)
description:
While traveling on your one-man space ship, the onboard AI, Ducky, has awoken you from cryogenic suspension due to an engine malfunction. While attempting to land safely on a nearby asteroid, in order to assess and repair the damage, a catastrophic failure occurs, forcing you to use an escape pod.

Now, having crash-landed onto the asteroid shrouded in darkness, you'll need to find the necessary resources to fix your spaceship and escape.

Thanks to Ducky and your trusty lantern, you'll be able to explore and gather the materials to craft and upgrade your equipment while uncovering the secrets of this unexplored landscape.

However, you never know what might be hiding in the darkness, so do be careful.

Installation
  1. Extract the LightKeeper_v0.5.1.zip
  2. Run the LightKeeper.exe
  3. Enjoy!
